articles.author: Polo Sandoval, Rebekah Riess
articles.title: 4 US citizens missing after being assaulted and kidnapped in Mexico were targeted by mistake, US official says - CNN
articles.description: Authorities believe the group of Americans assaulted and kidnapped in Matamoros, Mexico, Friday were targeted by mistake and were not the intended victims in the attack, a US official with knowledge of the investigation tells CNN.
articles.content:
[Breaking news update, published at 11:29 a.m. ET]
